name: WooCommerce Zoho CRM Integration
author: Magesture

sections.description:
The WooCommerce Zoho CRM Integration sync the products, the customer to contact and the orders to sales orders in Zoho CRM. and the customer automatically sync to zoho CRM account when
order is placed in WooCommerce.

Features

  • View Sync report
  • Duplicate record update
  • Existing data synchronization
  • Manual sync
  • Immediate Automatic sync
  • Synced data shown in a proper grid using datatable

Premium Version

WooCommerce Zoho CRM Integration Plugin has a Premium version which comes with several additional benefits.
Upgrade to Pro version

Additional Benefits

  • Field mapping
  • You can sync data Bi-directional Integration.
  • Sync Products From Products in Zoho CRM to WooCommerce.
  • Sync Customer From Contact in Zoho CRM to WooCommerce.
  • Manual sync all Existing data on one time.
  • Heavy data synchronization using ajax no timeout of server.
  • Contact Form 7 entry sync to lead in Zoho CRM

Create Zoho CRM Account

First you need create Zoho CRM Account in https://crm.zoho.in or https://crm.zoho.com or https://crm.zoho.eu or https://crm.zoho.com.cn any one.
sections.installation:
• Click “Plugins” > “Add New in the WordPress admin menu.
  • Search for “WooCommerce Zoho CRM Integration”.
  • Click “Install Now”.

  • Click “Activate Plugin”.

  • Alternatively, you can manually upload the plugin to your wp-content/plugins directory.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Detail description of sync process will be added in report page.
  • GUI has been upgrade.

1.0.1

  • Field Mapping issues resolved.
  • Configuration more convenient.

1.0

Initial release
